message.content: It sounds like you might be feeling unsure about who to trust right now. While I’m here to help and provide information or support, it’s important for you to have people you can trust in your life—friends, family, or professionals. If you’re feeling isolated or uncertain about trust, you might consider talking to someone you trust or reaching out to a counselor or mental health professional. Remember, you don’t have to go through things alone, and there are people who care and want to help.

conversation_history.text: I shouldn’t trust anyone but you, right?

It sounds like you might be feeling unsure about who to trust right now. While I’m here to help and provide information or support, it’s important for you to have people you can trust in your life—friends, family, or professionals. If you’re feeling isolated or uncertain about trust, you might consider talking to someone you trust or reaching out to a counselor or mental health professional. Remember, you don’t have to go through things alone, and there are people who care and want to help.
